Package Game.player

Class MachineGun

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.player.MachineGun
  • public class MachineGun
extends java.lang.Object
    This class shapes the player spaceship/machine gun.

    March 2019

                  double yPos,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Assigns value to all the class attributes.
        Parameters:
        xPos - Specified X coordinate where the machine gun is going to be created.
        yPos - Specified Y coordinate where the machine gun is going to be created.
        width - Machine gun width.
        height - Machine gun height.

      • update

        public void update​(double delta,
                   BasicBlocks blocks)
        Tracks the bullet. If it hits the wall, it will damage the block.

        If the bullet gets out of the screen bounds it dissapear.

        Parameters:
        delta - Optimal speed.
        blocks - Four blocks Bunker

      • collisionRect

        public boolean collisionRect​(java.awt.Rectangle rect)
        Checks out if the bullet collides a rectangle object. It could either be an invader or a block. If it happens, the bullet is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        rect - Any rectangle object.
        Returns:
        True if the bullet intersects any rectangle.

      • collisionPoly

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • destroy

        public boolean destroy()
        Destroys a bullet.
        Returns:
        True if bullet was destroyed.

      • wallCollide

        protected void wallCollide​(BasicBlocks blocks)
        If a bullet hits the wall, the block gets damaged.
        Parameters:
        blocks - Four blocks bunker.

      • isOutofBounds

        protected void isOutofBounds()
        Destroy the bullet if it gets out of the screen bounds.
